text: DITC Presents Wild Life is an EP by hip-hop collective Diggin' in the Crates Crew put together by Show and released independently through the then new Wild Life Entertainment label. The EP is made in Memory of Big L, B.O., Mad Mark & Autumn Rose (see 2001 in music). ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" |- !align="center"|# !align="center" width="150"|Title !align="center" width="150"|Producer(s) !align="center" width="150"|Performer (s) |- |A1 |"Hold It Down" (Main) |Show |Party Arty, A Bless, AG |- |A2 |"Bad Reputation" (Main) |Ahmed |A Bless, O.C., Party Arty |- |A3 |"That's Bless" (Main) |Show |A Bless |- |A4 |"Best Behaviour" (Main) |Ahmed |Big Pun, Fat Joe |- |B1 |"Hold It Down" (Clean) |Show |Party Arty, A Bless, AG |- |B2 |"That's Bless" (Clean) |Show |A Bless |- |B3 |"Best Behaviour" (Clean) |Ahmed |Big Pun, Fat Joe |- |B4 |"Hold It Down" (Instrumental) |Show | |- |B5 |"Bad Reputation" (Instrumental) |Ahmed | |- |B6 |"That's Bless" (Instrumental) |Ahmed | |- |B7 |"Best Behaviour" (Instrumental) |Show | |} Category:Diggin' in the Crates Crew albums Category:2001 EPs
title: DITC Presents Wild Life
